thread.title: RBS in $4.9 Billion U.S. Settlement Over Mortgage-Backed Securities

author: Josh Beckerman
title: RBS in $4.9 Billion U.S. Settlement Over Mortgage-Backed Securities

organizations.name: u.s. settlement over mortgage-backed securities royal bank of scotland group plc

text:
LONDON—Royal Bank of Scotland Group PLC has agreed to pay $4.9 billion to settle with the Justice Department over the sale of toxic mortgage-backed securities in the lead-up to the global financial crisis, clearing the path for the bank’s privatization.
The U.K. government controlled bank said Wednesday it reached a civil settlement “in principle” with the Justice Department to end the long-running probe into the matter. The bank has already set aside funds to cover the bulk of the settlement but said it would book an additional...
